titles: Fury fiered, or, Crueltie scourged preached at S. Buttolphs without Bishops-gate, Nouem. 18. 1623 / by Iohn Sedguuick ...
author: Sedgwick, John, 1600 or 1601-1643.
publisher: ... by I L. for William Sheffard, and ... be sold at his shop, at the entring of Popes-head Alley, out of Lumbard-streete,
notes: Imperfect: filmed copy contains t.p. only.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
